div.head: 四肢拳冷
div.div: the four limbs are [twisted into] fists and are cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the four limbs are [twisted into] fists and are cold

sense.def: Illness Sign of the four limbs being twisted with a feeling of cold. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hui dang 褌 襠 quotes Ji ji fang 濟急方 : 中鬼昏厥：四肢拳冷，口鼻出血。用久污溺衣燒灰，每服二 錢，沸湯下。男用女，女用男 , “Demon stroke with clouding and recession: The four limbs are [twisted into] fists and are cold . The mouth and nose bleed. Take a diaper soiled with urine over a long time and burn to ashes. For each dose ingest 2 qian , and swallow with hot water. Males use [the diaper] of females; females use those of males”.
